Uses of Class
com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.annotations.Experimental

  • Packages that use Experimental 
    Package Description
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.client
    This package contains all the relevant classes for the Client.
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.server
    This package contains all the relevant classes for the Server.
    com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.clients
    This is the core package for Communication.

    • Uses of Experimental in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.client

      Methods in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.client with annotations of type Experimental 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T RemoteObjectAccess.getRemoteObject(Class<T> clazz)
      The call of this Method will result in a callable instance of the provided class.
      void RemoteObjectAccess.updateRemoteInvocationProducer(InvocationHandlerProducer invocationHandlerProducer)
      This Method changes the InvocationHandlerProducer set internally.

    • Uses of Experimental in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.server

      Methods in com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.server with annotations of type Experimental 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void RemoteObjectRegistration.clear()
      Clears out all saved instances.
      void RemoteObjectRegistration.hook(Object object)
      Register the provided Object by all its class and all declared interfaces.
      void RemoteObjectRegistration.register(Object object)
      This call will register the given Object, identified by its class.
      void RemoteObjectRegistration.register(Object o, Class<?>... identifier)
      This call will register the given Object, identified by ALL given Classes.
      RemoteObjectRegistration ServerStart.remoteObjects()
      Returns an internally maintained RemoteObjectRegistration.
      RemoteAccessCommunicationResponse RemoteObjectRegistration.run(RemoteAccessCommunicationRequest request)
      This call executes an RemoteAccessCommunicationRequest with the provided instances internally, then return a RemoteAccessCommunicationResponse.
      void ServerStart.setExecutorService(ExecutorService executorService)
      Sets the ExecutorService, to be used internally
      void RemoteObjectRegistration.unhook(Object object)
      Similarly to Hook, this will search for all public interfaces, declared by the direct class of the Object and unregister them
      void RemoteObjectRegistration.unregister(Class... identifier)
      This call unregisters any Objects, registered at any way internally.
      void RemoteObjectRegistration.unregister(Object object)
      Unregisters an given Object, identified by its class.
      void RemoteObjectRegistration.unregister(Object object, Class... identifiers)
      This call will unregisters the given Object, identified by ALL given Classes.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Connection.setThreadPool(ExecutorService executorService)
      This method sets the ExecutorService, that the ReceivingService and the SendingService are executed in.
